Text:
If you have never seen this its a MUST WATCH! Bakshi is a north american Icon IMO. This film in particular is astounding. This rates right up there withMyazakies` work (Howls Moving Castle, Princess Monooke (Spellcheck!). 

     I have a crappy version and I am exstatic that you have posted this great quaility version fasamoo!!!!!!

      Ill burn this puppy to DvD proper and retire my older version. Trust me folks...this is a true American Classic! (And thats comeing from me a Canuck LOL)

                Silk
